Package clientGUIControllers

Class MyOrderController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.MyOrderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MyOrderController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, Observer
This class gives the user the option to select product he want to buy and adds them to a shopping cart: displaying the total price and enable a get button to move to the checkout screen to confirm and pay for the order. Displaying the products and the last quantity or out of stock labels, and click to add to cart using the ProductViewController. Displaying the products in cart and enabling to add, sub and remove the product using the CartProductScreen. using the OrderTimer from the OrderTimerEntityController this class display the time left before the order automatically ends. . This class makes use of the tables: 'productinfacility' or 'product', which contain the product details (getting the product to display and updating inventory accordingly)

    • updateCart

      public boolean updateCart(float productPrice, Product product, boolean isAdder)
      This method update the cart details when a product is added from another scene, uses the quantityUpdate to update the inventory.
      Parameters:
      productPrice - the product price
      product - product object
      isAdder - true if we want to add the product and false if we remove the product
      Returns:
      true if we successfully updated and false if there is no inventory to preform this action
